availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Walter Jarboe and Theresa Jarboe. Married to Martha J. Richeson Jarboe in Taylor County, Kentucky, on November 17, 1863. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Farmer in Marion County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Taylor County Marriages, Film 000983728.
